column4: i had with totem, could not see xvid codecs, i installed vlc and it worked, but i didnt like it and removed vlc, now i have no sound in totem, some one that knows why?
any other programs you can watch Xvid with?
FYI: mplayer (w/o win32 codecs cuz I'm on x86_64) plays almost every video I throw at it
only some WMV ones cannot be played, but are a real minority, and not very important to me anyway.
